title: Plant Growth in Microgravity
description: Crew is observing how plants grow without gravity. The Arabidopsis plants are showing interesting root patterns in the Advanced Plant Habitat.
author: Jessica Watkins

title: Earth Photography Session
description: Astronauts are taking photos of the Amazon rainforest and monitoring deforestation patterns. The view from 400km up is incredible!
author: Oleg Artemyev

title: Daily Exercise Routine
description: Crew is working out to stay healthy in microgravity. Using the Advanced Resistive Exercise Device (ARED) for strength training.
author: Samantha Cristoforetti

title: Spacewalk Preparation
description: Preparing tools and equipment for tomorrow's planned spacewalk. Checking spacesuits and reviewing procedures.
author: Sergey Prokopyev

title: Crew Dinner Time
description: Enjoying a meal together in the Unity module. Today's menu includes rehydrated chicken and vegetables.
author: Frank Rubio

title: Morning Science Experiments
description: Conducting fluid physics experiments in the Microgravity Science Glovebox. Studying how fluids behave in space.
author: Dmitry Petelin
